text: Those ˹hypocrites˺ who remained behind rejoiced for doing so in defiance of the Messenger of God and hated ˹the prospect of˺ striving with their wealth and their lives in the cause of God. They said ˹to one another˺, “Do not march forth in the heat.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “The Fire of Hell is far hotter!” If only they could comprehend
